alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 16 at 3:35AM EDT until July 17 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation in the most vulnerable shoreline locations. * WHERE...Marthas Vineyard, from Vineyard Haven to Oak Bluffs and Edgartown. * WHEN...Late tonight. * IMPACTS...Some water on the most vulnerable low lying roads and property. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/01 AM 2.1/ 2.6 0.1/ 0.6 0.2/ 0.7 1 None 16/02 PM 2.0/ 2.5 0.0/ 0.5 0.2/ 0.7 1 None 17/03 AM 2.1/ 2.6 0.1/ 0.6 0.1/ 0.6 1 None 17/03 PM 1.9/ 2.3 -0.2/ 0.3 0.1/ 0.6 1-2 None 18/03 AM 2.0/ 2.5 0.0/ 0.5 0.2/ 0.7 2 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
